title: The second part of, If you know not me, you know no bodie VVith the building of the Royall Exchange: and the famous victorie of Queene Elizabeth, in the yeare 1588.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot] for Nathaniell Butter,
notes: Running title reads: If you know not me, you know no body.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
